mapper.insert: insert into clubapplication (userId, club_name, description, place, email,state) values (#{userid},#{clubName},#{description},#{place},#{email},0)
mapper.select: select c.userId, username,c.club_name,c.description,c.place,c.email, c.state from clubapplication c left join user u on u.id = c.userId
select count(*) from clubapplication where userId = #{userId} and club_name = #{clubName} limit 1
